content.text: Match ends, Stoke City 2, Swansea City 1.
Second Half ends, Stoke City 2, Swansea City 1.
Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) is shown the yellow card.
Offside, Stoke City. Peter Crouch tries a through ball, but Xherdan Shaqiri is caught offside.
Offside, Stoke City. Peter Crouch tries a through ball, but Mame Biram Diouf is caught offside.
Corner,  Stoke City. Conceded by Martin Olsson.
Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Renato Sanches (Swansea City).
Renato Sanches (Swansea City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Erik Pieters (Stoke City).

Substitution, Stoke City. Ramadan Sobhi replaces Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting.
